oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Corissa Shenefield correspondence with Emma Mirick, 1874 December 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Shenefield, Corissa
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Corissa Shenefield to her cousin Emma Mirick sharing family news, including news of the birth of her first child. The Miricks are Martha Ann Bell's family of origin.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Families -- Social life and customs
Shenefield, Ralph Edwin; Shenefield, Cal
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Emma Bell Miles and Bell Family correspondence, 1874-1911
Emma Bell Miles correspondence, journals, and other material, 1879-1918
Jean Miles Catino and Emma Bell Miles papers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Emma Bell Miles Southern Appalachia art and correspondence
